name: Survivors of the Plague
description:
The Scarlet Plague has spread across the world!

Survive the infected, with the help of a vast arsenal and basic hygiene.

Rescue other survivors along the way, unravel mysteries and find the ingredients scattered throughout the most insane and inhospitable places to find the cure and defeat the Scarlet Death!

At your fingertips are various combinations of weapons and upgrades and dozens of playable characters.

Full controller or keyboard support.
